title: Author Schema
description: A schema to validate author data for the XIV Resource Registry project.

name.description: The name of the author or creator of the resource.

kofi_url.description: The URL to the author's Ko-fi page.

paypal_url.description: The URL to the author's PayPal page.

patreon_url.description: The URL to the author's Patreon page.

website_url.description: The URL to the author's personal website.
